meanings.sent1: I used a gazetteer to find the location of different countries.
meanings.sent2: The gazetteer listed all the rivers and mountains in the region.
meanings.sent3: The gazetteer decided to take a vacation and explore the world.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a gazetteer of memories, each place marked with a different emotion.
meanings.sent5: The gazetteer was like a treasure map, leading us to hidden gems around the globe.

meanings.definition: A publication containing detailed information about a specific area.
meanings.sent1: The local gazetteer provided insights into the history of the town.
meanings.sent2: She bought a gazetteer to learn more about the culture of the city.
meanings.sent3: The gazetteer threw a party to celebrate its latest edition.
meanings.sent4: His room looked like a gazetteer exploded, with papers and maps everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The gazetteer was a doorway to a world of knowledge waiting to be explored.
